title: Naked Mole Rat Gets Dressed
description: Wilbur is different from the other Naked Mole Rats in his Colony, because he wears clothes (and he likes it!). But what will happen when Grandpah, the oldest, wisest, and most naked Naked Mole Rat ever discovers Wilbur's secretFunnyman and three-time Caldecott Honoree Mo Willems exposes the naked truth about being yourself and wearing it well.
author: Mo Willems
